title: At Sydney
text: At Sydney, ICC affords delegates, exhibitors and visitors convenient access to Australia’s most cosmopolitan city.

title: Sydney's Central Precinct
subtitle: Sydney, April 2024
text: ICC is situated at the intersection of Sydney’s academic, cultural and technology precincts.

title: Innovation Heart
subtitle: Sydney, April 2024
text: ICC functions as an incubator for ideas, a champion of change and an advocate for community.
